Quotes.quote: Our actions are our own, but fate pushes us.
Quotes.author: Regina

Quotes.quote: Horse: "You fell, but I have got you."
Quotes.author: Charlie Mackery
Quotes.found in: The boy, the mole, the fox and the horse

Quotes.quote: Horse: "I know, tears fall for a reason, and are your strength, not weakness."
Quotes.author: Charlie Mackery
Quotes.found in: The boy, the mole, the fox and the horse

Quotes.quote: Horse: "Life is difficult, but you are loved."
Quotes.author: Charlie Mackery
Quotes.found in: The boy, the mole, the fox and the horse

Quotes.quote: Fox: "You know, sometimes, your minds plays tricks on you. It can tell you you are not good, that it's all hopeless, but I discovered this: You are loved and important, and you bring to this world things, that no one else can. So hold on."
Quotes.author: Charlie Mackery
Quotes.found in: The boy, the mole, the fox and the horse

Quotes.quote: You have your way. I have my way. As for the right way, the correct way, and the only way, it does not exist.
Quotes.author: Friedrich Nietzsche
